item.title: THE VIBEC0RE MOVEMENT: A MANIFESTO
item.description: WE ARE THE FUTURE ðŸ’œâš¡ðŸ”¥ Listen up, chooms. The old world is dead. The new world is VIBEC0RE. We discovered that productivity isn’t about following rules. It’s about BREAKING THEM. The Core Principles 1.
